definition.content: Embrace is a mobile observability and data platform that empowers mobile teams to deliver optimal user experiences via performance optimization, issue prioritization and remediation, and monitoring across features, releases, and custom segments. Learn more about [how our customers are using Embrace](https://embrace.io/case-studies/wish/) today!

Embrace collects comprehensive session-level data that mobile teams use for performance and stability optimizations. Embrace provides dashboards that track key mobile health metrics that can now be surfaced in Datadog. This allows mobile teams to view client and server data in a single view, which provides better visibility and faster response times. 

With this integration, mobile teams can monitor their entire stack from a single location. In one unified workflow, they can spot a regression and investigate the full session details with a single click. The result is the quickest way to go from incident to impact to resolution.

## Metrics

- Crash
- Networking
- App Performance
- Logs
- ANRs
- App Health
- Adoption
- Engagement

## Integration Documentation 

Welcome to Embrace, we’re excited you’re here! The ability to see client and server side data in a single view can be powerful. We’ve partnered with Datadog to enable your teams with easy visibility. 

1. Start a free trial with Embrace and follow our [documentation here](https://embrace.io/docs/). **You’ll need to complete a basic integration before seeing metrics within Datadog.**
2. After completion of the Embrace integration, you can come back to Datadog to connect both platforms. 
3. Create a new “New Dashboard” in Datadog and select the Embrace widget.
4. Authenticate and connect your Embrace account to Datadog by simply logging in with your credentials. 
5. Create your new widget within Datadog to display Embrace data with crash or networking metrics and give it a title. 
6. Watch the magic happen! You can click into “Details” to dive deeper into Embrace from Datadog. 

Please reach out to datadogsupport@embrace.io if you have any questions!
